Articles.Content: with the original developers blessings i am taking over the development of the retrofuture mod, if you have any requests, bug reports or issues with the latest build post here so i can make a comprehensive revamp and eliminate all the bugs from a 0.25 mod

28 minutes ago, amankd said:

with the original developers blessings i am taking over the development of the retrofuture mod, if you have any requests, bug reports or issues with the latest build post here so i can make a comprehensive revamp and eliminate all the bugs from a 0.25 mod

do you have experience with modding and stuff?

yeah for the part side, the pluggins and such less so, i hope its just a case of referencing all the right modules

i have done pretty much every other part of modding
Nice!.... Are you gonna take the Transparent command Pod too?
if i an figure out how it works sure, but i cant write pluggins for toss
bug number one, firespitter plugin out of date, a simple fix!

1) node attach on pods brocked

2) POD IVA BROCKEN

3)small nose cone node inverted

4)large nose cone node inverted

50SMALL INTAKE NODE INVERTED

6) R10  NODE INVERTED

7)a16 also

8) hb forward inverted

9)v12 inverted

10)mkd inverted

ithr v12 and classic

 

good new is that the fuel swith is working and the animations also, the most work will be the iva's

 

inline pod iva's are good though

ramjet engine broken

structual  boom also screwey

and nose gun

 

crew compartment also

Edited December 12, 2015 by amankd

inline  docking port aft node screwy

 

but that nseems to be the lot

 

Edited December 12, 2015 by amankd

okay fixed radial attchment of pods and the nose cone inversion

aeropspikes not loading
the main isse appers to be that they are being called node_stack_top whenn they are on the bottom
im gonna release my version as is (nearly all working) and reluy on bug reports to filter out the ones i miss

Sounds good. I always liked retro future.

As to the Transparent pods, I've been playing with them in 1.04 and I have not run into any issues yet, The Iva is fine the RPM comes up fine the Attachment nodes seem to be fine.

20 hours ago, Admiral-Helwyr said:

Sounds good. I always liked retro future.

As to the Transparent pods, I've been playing with them in 1.04 and I have not run into any issues yet, The Iva is fine the RPM comes up fine the Attachment nodes seem to be fine.

thanks for the info, i should be able to just straight up release them then

I tried this, and the textures are still broken on all of the engines (well, the VTOL Shoto and Tanto are fine, which is something) for me, as they were since 0.90, if I remember correctly.  I was going to ask if there would be an update to the Space Tug, because the textures have been messed up on that one for quite a while too, but since nothing has actually been 'fixed' for 1.0.5, it's cool.

I've run into a bottom attachment problem with the 1.25m version of the low-profile rocket motor. I can't make a decoupler stick under it.

Also there was a zip file of alternate textures for the aircraft parts included in previous versions, but I couldn't find it in your release. I may have looked in the wrong place but I don't know.
